title: OrchestrationDAGPlan
description: A Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) representing a multi-step data analysis plan.

plan.description: An array of nodes that form the execution graph.

items.title: PlanNode
items.description: A single task node in the analysis plan.

node_id.description: A unique identifier for this step.

agent.description: The specialist agent assigned to execute the task.

task.description: A detailed, natural language instruction for the agent.

dependencies.description: A list of 'node_id's that must be completed before this node can run.

input_data.description: A list of 'output_name's from dependency nodes that serve as input for this task.

output_name.description: The key under which the resulting DataFrame will be stored in the data context.
